translations: n.[病理] 水肿，浮肿；贿余

phrs.translation: 水肿, 积水, 小丑多普希, 多普希
饥饿水肿, 营养不良性水肿, 详细翻译
战时浮肿, 战时水肿
营养不良性水肿, 翻译

sentences.sentence: Just can conduce to ascites and dropsy so reduce.
sentences.translation: 这样才能有助于腹水和浮肿的减轻。

sentences.sentence: Various organs even hyperemia, dropsy or necrosis.
sentences.translation: 各器官均充血、水肿或坏死。

sentences.sentence: 2there in front of him was a man suffering from dropsy.
sentences.translation: 在他面前有一个患水臌的人。
